synopsis.text: January 30, 2015 marked the retail release of a special OVA episode, which was initially distributed during Comiket 87. In this episode, the beloved Twin Angels, Haruka, Aoi, and Hazuki, take a well-deserved break at a luxurious hotel in Miyazaki, a seaside city, accompanied by familiar faces from the series. As they engage in various leisure activities, they stumble upon criminal activity, forcing them to don their Twin Angel personas and restore order. This thrilling blend of relaxation and crime-fighting promises an engaging viewing experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
